mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_hr_Staffturnover ( FID, FNAME, FNUMBER, FSIMPLEPINYIN, FDESCRIPTION, FCREATETIME, FKCREATORID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FKUPDATORID, FKCONTROLUNITID, FKORGID, FSUBMITDATE, FAUDITDATE, FPROCESSINSTANCE, FKAPPLYPERSONID, FAPPLYPERSONNAME, FKAPPLYORGID, FKAPPLYCHANGEORGID, FKAPPLYPOSITIONID, FKAPPLYCHANGEPOSITIONID, FKAPPLYJOBLEVELID, FKAPPLYCHANGEJOBLEVELID, FBILLSTATUS, FCHANGETYPE, FREMARK, FVALIDATETIME, FGIVETIME, FKGIVEPERSONID, FKBASICDATAID, FTITLE, FISEFFECTIVE ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{simplePinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlUnit.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPerson.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyOrg.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyChangeOrg.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyPosition.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyChangePosition.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyJoblevel.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyChangeJoblevel.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{giveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{givePerson.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basicData.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEffective,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT D.FID AS "id", D.FNAME AS "name", D.FNUMBER AS "number", D.FSIMPLEPINYIN AS "simplePinyin", D.FDESCRIPTION AS "description", D.FCREATETIME AS "createTime", D.FKCREATORID AS "creator.id", D.FLASTUPDATETIME AS "lastUpdateTime", D.FKUPDATORID AS "updator.id", D.FKCONTROLUNITID AS "controlUnit.id", D.FKORGID AS "org.id", D.FSUBMITDATE AS "submitDate", D.FAUDITDATE AS "auditDate", D.FPROCESSINSTANCE AS "processInstance", D.FKAPPLYPERSONID AS "applyPerson.id", PE.FNAME AS "applyPerson.name", D.FKAPPLYORGID AS "applyOrg.id", D.FKAPPLYCHANGEORGID AS "applyChangeOrg.id", D.FKAPPLYPOSITIONID AS "applyPosition.id", D.FKAPPLYCHANGEPOSITIONID AS "applyChangePosition.id", D.FKAPPLYJOBLEVELID AS "applyJoblevel.id", D.FKAPPLYCHANGEJOBLEVELID AS "applyChangeJoblevel.id", D.FBILLSTATUS AS "billStatus", D.FCHANGETYPE AS "changeType", D.FREMARK AS "remark", D.FVALIDATETIME AS "validateTime", D.FGIVETIME AS "giveTime", D.FKGIVEPERSONID AS "givePerson.id", D.FKBASICDATAID AS "basicData.id", D.FTITLE AS "title", p.fname as "applyPosition.name", PE.fNUMBER AS "applyPerson.number", PE.FINNERDATE AS "applyPerson.innerDate", PE.fPHONE AS "applyPerson.phone", PE.fjobStatus as "applyPerson.jobStatus", PE.FpersonStatus AS "applyPerson.personStatus", PE.FSEX as "applyPerson.sex", o.fname as "applyOrg.name", j.fname as "applyJoblevel.name", JB.FNAME AS "applyJoblevel.job.name", B.FNAME AS "basicData.name" , CREATOR.FNAME AS "createName", CREATORPOSITION.FNAME AS "createPositionName" , CREATORORG.FNAME AS "createOrgName", giveP.FNAME AS "givePerson.name", D.FISEFFECTIVE AS "isEffective" FROM t_hr_Staffturnover D left join T_BD_POSITION P ON D.FKapplyPositionID = P.FID LEFT JOIN T_BD_ORG O ON D.FKapplyOrgID = O.FID LEFT JOIN T_BD_JOBLEVEL J ON J.FID = D.FKapplyJoblevelID LEFT JOIN T_BD_JOB JB ON JB.FID=J.FKJOBID left join t_bd_person PE on D.FKapplyPersonID = PE.FID LEFT JOIN T_BD_BASICDATA B ON D.FKBASICDATAID = B.FID LEFT JOIN T_BD_PERSON CREATOR ON CREATOR.FID = D.FKCREATORID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T_BD_PERSONPOSITION WHERE FPRIMARY = 1) CREATORPP ON CREATORPP.FKPERSONID = D.FKCREATORID LEFT JOIN T_BD_POSITION CREATORPOSITION ON CREATORPOSITION.FID = CREATORPP.FKPOSITIONID LEFT JOIN T_BD_ORG CREATORORG ON CREATORORG.FID = CREATORPOSITION.FKBELONGORGID left join t_bd_person giveP ON D.FKgivePersonID = giveP.FID WHERE D.FID = #{id}
